system.description: This Character can wield Heavy Ranged weapons that do not have the Ogryn-Proof Quality as if they did not have the Clumsy Trait. However if such a weapon Jams, the weapon will break unless the character's Comrade is within Cohesion of them. Broken weapons require a -20 Tech-Use Test and several minutes to repair.
